ISSUE.TITLE: Uploading the default image from the admin area
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 > In the following > `Configuration > Settings > Media Settings` > Add photo upload to set your default image for products. > Note: I know you can change it in code, or rename your default photo to match Nop and upload it to respective directories, Just thought this would be a nice feature to add. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/91322/default-product-image We already have `Media.DefaultImageName`, but the user must still manually put the image to the server. Let's add a way to upload it from the admin area.
